citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The last IACUC meeting was held 3/17/16 . The IACUC must review at least once every 6 months, the research
facility's program for humane care and use of animals , and prepare reports of its evaluation including the inspection
of the animal facility .
CORRECT BY : 2/3/17
NOTE : Meeting is scheduled for next week.

narrative:
2.31(c)(1)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
The last IACUC meeting was held 3/17/16 . The IACUC must review at least once every 6 months, the research
facility's program for humane care and use of animals , and prepare reports of its evaluation including the inspection
of the animal facility . 
CORRECT BY : 2/3/17 
NOTE : Meeting is scheduled for next week.
